comment:
по клику на взломанные двери отсека баркает Паскаль

AmarnathFinalBattleTruth+1 
одноразовый

languages.text: "Отсек был взломан изнутри. Судя по остаточным следам окалины, был использован мельта-заряд".
"The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of scaling suggest the use of a melta charge."
languages.original_text: "Отсек был взломан изнутри. Судя по остаточным следам окалины, был использован мельта-заряд".

traits.locale_text: "The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of dross suggest the use of a melta charge."
"The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of dross suggest the use of a melta charge."
"The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of dross suggest the use of a melta charge."
"The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of dross suggest the use of a melta charge."
"The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of scaling suggest the use of a melta charge."
"The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of scaling suggest the use of a melta charge."

languages.text: 「内部からベイに侵入されている。スケーリングの痕跡から、メルタ・チャージを使ったようだ」
languages.original_text: "The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of scaling suggest the use of a melta charge."

traits.locale_text: 「内部からベイに侵入されている。スケーリングの痕跡から、メルタ・チャージを使ったようだ」

languages.text: “这个船舱是从内部被攻破的。残留的废渣表明，入侵者使用了热熔炸弹。”
languages.original_text: "The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of scaling suggest the use of a melta charge."

traits.locale_text: “这个船舱是从内部被攻破的。残留的废渣表明，入侵者使用了热熔炸弹。”

languages.text: « La brèche dans la baie est venue de l'intérieur. Les traces de dépôt semblent suggérer l'utilisation d'une charge à fusion. »
languages.original_text: "The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of scaling suggest the use of a melta charge."

traits.locale_text: « La brèche dans la baie est venue de l'intérieur. Les traces de rebut semblent suggérer l'utilisation d'une charge à fusion. »

languages.text: «Accedieron a la bahía desde dentro. Hay rastros de desescamado que evidencian el uso de carga de fusión».
languages.original_text: "The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of scaling suggest the use of a melta charge."

traits.locale_text: «Accedieron a la bahía desde dentro. Hay rastros de desechos que evidencian el uso de carga de fusión».

languages.text: "Das Modul wurde von innen heraus aufgebrochen. Die chemischen Rückstände weisen auf den Gebrauch einer Melterladung hin."
languages.original_text: "The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of scaling suggest the use of a melta charge."

traits.locale_text: "Das Modul wurde von innen heraus aufgebrachen. Die chemischen Rückstände weisen auf den Gebrauch einer Melterladung hin."

languages.text: "Bölme, içeriden açılmış. Döküntülerin izleri, melta bombası kullanıldığını işaret ediyor."
languages.original_text: "The bay was breached from the inside. Traces of scaling suggest the use of a melta charge."

traits.locale_text: "Bölme içeriden açılmış. Döküntülerin izleri, melta bombası kullanıldığına işaret ediyor."
